title: Supp Singed (some food for thought)
body:
I love singed as a champion and I love the way he (in a way) forces you to play a certain way.
Champions like this make me think that league of legends is the most artisitic and best game I've played.

But yet I have an idea.
Singed has a throw right, 
What if he could throw allies (I main support) 
It would make him a very interesting support.

This leads to his other abilities,
Maybe when he throws his allies into the goop it gives them a speed boost 
Or
When allies run through his gas they get mana back/sec.

It's a simple idea that might be thrown in the trash. But I thought it was cool enough to post about.
